00078 IndexEntry::isKeyFrame()

00083 IndexEntry*
00084 IndexEntry::make(int64_t position, int64_t timeStamp,
00085     int32_t flags, int32_t size, int32_t minDistance)
00086 {
00087   IndexEntry* retval = make();
00088   if (retval) {
00089     retval->mEntry.pos = position;
00090     retval->mEntry.timestamp = timeStamp;
00091     retval->mEntry.flags = flags;
00092     retval->mEntry.size = size;
00093     retval->mEntry.min_distance = minDistance;
00094   }
00095   return retval;
00096 }
